EmailTemplate.name: Middle East Regional Sweep.Navigation Database Services Workshop.Navigation Data
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Navigation Database Services Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}
Your registration for the Honeywell Satcom Workshop in Raunheim, Germany has been received.
If you are able to attend, I look forward to welcoming you to the event on Wednesday July 15th. If you require any further information about the event, the agenda or venue, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.
If you are unable to attend but would like further information on our range of products and services, please do not hesitate to contact me, and I would be delighted to arrange a separate meeting.
Maria Sanchez
Technical Support Manager
Honeywell Aerospace
